translation.en: There is enough fish for everyone.
-You have to serve me first. -No, I was here first.
translation.ja: 〈まず私から〉 〈私のほうが先よ〉

translation.en: Ekah, you need to serve me. I live far off.
translation.ja: 〈エカ 私に売って家が遠いの〉

translation.en: Yes, yes, I know who came first and who was last.
whoever stands in line, will get extra fish.
translation.ja: 〈並んだ人に魚を売ります〉 〈分かった〉

translation.en: [in English] See, take this one. [in Kamtok] Buy something for yourself.
Keep it! You need it more than I do.
This business would be nothing without you.
translation.ja: 〈お前のおかげで商売ができる〉

translation.en: [in English] Thank you. [in Kamtok] Thank you.
[in English] We'll go house. We'll go house.
Because the fish is well roasted.
[in English] You know why we give you the name, Ekah?
translation.ja: なぜエカと名付けたと？

translation.en: Why'd we give you that name?
[in Kamtok] Because it was your mother's name.
When I look at you, all I see is my mother.
translation.ja: 〈お前は俺の母親に似ている〉

translation.en: [in English] Even the way you burn this fish, you burn it like my mama.
translation.ja: この魚の焼き方まで同じ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't take care of you, who will?
translation.ja: 〈パパを世話するのは私しかいない〉

translation.en: I want you to know, our hard work,
[in Kamtok] If you ask for the top three fish people in this village... [in English] ...they will call my name.
And when they call my name, they will call your name, too.
translation.ja: お前だって名を連ねてる

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Keep up the good work.
Papa, if I ask you something...
You be like your mommy plenty now?
[in English] I be like my mama plenty.
[in Kamtok] Do you love my mother?
You are too young to understand.
When you grow up, you will understand.
translation.ja: 〈大きくなればいずれ分かる〉

translation.en: [in English] When you grow, we will talk. [in Kamtok] Do you hear me?
translation.ja: その時が来たら話そう

translation.en: [in English] Fine works, mama. Fine work.
translation.ja: 気が利くな　偉いぞ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I don't want to ever leave you.
This can never happen to you.
You will not be a slave, in any man's house.
The teacher is waiting for her fish. Rush there.
translation.ja: 〈学校の先生が魚を待ってる〉

translation.en: [in English] This fish is too small.
[in Kamtok] That's how you always buy it.
[in English] Are you kidding me? This fish is small.
translation.ja: まさか　小さいでしょ

translation.en: I've been buying from Solomon, he should understand.
translation.ja: ずっと買ってあげてるのに

translation.en: [Solomon, in Kamtok] The teacher wasn't in school?
[in English] Then why waste time so?
[in Kamtok] Papa, I saw kids singing school songs. I love it.
translation.ja: 〈みんな学校で歌ってた〉 〈いいな〉

translation.en: How much Kiki's mother owe us?
[in English] Six thousand five hundred, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Huh, go and call your Uncle Lucas.
translation.ja: ルカス伯父さんを呼べ

translation.en: Tell him to come fast... Let's go and collect that debt. OK?
translation.ja: 〈取り立てに行くからすぐ来てくれと〉
〈昨日 バーバラを訪ねた〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She might die very soon.
Die with all of that education?
You sound like education is important.
Only lazy and stupid people go to school.
translation.ja: 〈怠け者のバカが―〉 〈学校に行って時間と金を無駄にする〉

translation.en: Everyone I know in this village, who dared to be educated is poor, ma.
translation.ja: 〈この村で教育を受けた人はみんな貧乏だ〉

translation.en: See, eh, that lazy boy, Peter. [in Kamtok] He still lives with his parents.
translation.ja: 〈例えば怠け者のピーターはいまだに両親と同居してる〉

translation.en: [in English] Joe too, the same thing.
[in Kamtok] Foolish Barbara decided to join them, too.
translation.ja: 〈愚かなバーバラもその仲間に入ろうとにした〉

translation.en: Barbara's case is heart-breaking. [in English] A long story.
translation.ja: 〈バーバラのことは気の毒に思うよ〉

translation.en: She went to school to study, and instead got pregnant.
translation.ja: 〈学校へ勉強しに行って妊娠した〉
そうだった　リタね

translation.en: [girl, in Kamtok] Mama, you know I hate school.
I prefer to be a fish girl rather than go to school.
translation.ja: 〈学校に行くより魚売りになりたい〉

translation.en: Or even get married like Aunty Rita.
I will buy you garri, so you can eat it with fish.
translation.ja: 〈ガリを買ってあげるから魚と食べなさい〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Solo, how did you find this beautiful place?
translation.ja: ソロ 〈なぜ こんな名所を？〉

translation.en: [in English] I'm a fisherman! I'm a fisherman!
translation.ja: 漁師だからな　俺は漁師だ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] It was here... [in English] ...when my papa ask my mama, if they can marry.
translation.ja: 〈ここで父さんは母さんにプロポーズした〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Yes, it is very beautiful.
And the way I like you,
only in calculator it will show up.
[in Kamtok] ...even a calculator cannot show it.
[in Kamtok] You know, I cannot make a good family, if I don't have a good wife.
translation.ja: 〈お前なしでいい家族を作れない〉

translation.en: [in English] You are the woman who done touched my heart.
Any time I look inside your eyes,
my body just makes some kind...
I want you to be my woman.
Be my woman, we could make some fine family, me and you.
translation.ja: お前と俺ならきっといい家族を作れる

translation.en: That I dream about, you know, ever since... Make me your woman, Solo.
translation.ja: 〈あなたの妻と呼ばれるのをずっと夢見てた〉

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] Is that a yes? -[in English] Yes!
[in Kamtok] You see why I say you melt my heart?
Thank you for the beautiful shoes. I like them a lot.
translation.ja: 〈靴をありがとう〉 〈気に入った〉

translation.en: [in English] Ah! I could do everything for my Barbara.
[Ekah, in Kamtok] What is she saying?
and one pen, can change the world."
"If one man can destroy the world,
[in Kamtok] Wh-- What is her name?
This is what killed your mother.
I will buy you a new fish barn next month. OK?
So you can roast fish very well.
Your father go, see a friend.
-[in Kamtok] Yes, uncle. -You are a very good child.
translation.ja: 伯父さん いい子だ
みんなが誇りに思ってる

translation.en: If one of my three boy, them, they cook like you so, I would have been a happy man.
translation.ja: 〈３人息子のうち１人でも見習ってほしかった〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Your father is very respected here, because of you.
translation.ja: 〈お前がいるから父親は一目置かれてる〉

translation.en: [in English] No change, eh. [in Kamtok] You should never change.
Have you ever asked yourself why all these educated kids are poor?
translation.ja: 〈なぜ教育を受けた子たちが貧しいか考えたことは？〉

translation.en: You understand? They are very lazy kids.
Has an educated person ever bought fish from you,

translation.ja: 〈値段に文句を言わず魚を買ったことがあるか？〉

translation.en: They are poor. We even feed them.
Stay just the way you are. We like you as you are.
[in Kamtok] Let nobody deceive you with education. Education is bad for women.
translation.ja: 〈教育にだまされるなよ女には毒だ〉

translation.en: -[both in Kamtok] How are you? -I'm all right.
Ekah. My uncle came back yesterday.
translation.ja: 〈昨日 私の伯父さんが帰ってきて〉

translation.en: He says I will start school on Monday.
translation.ja: 月曜から学校に行けって言うの

translation.en: I don't want to go to school. Please, give me an excuse to tell him.
translation.ja: 〈でも行きたくない〉 〈何て説得すればいい？〉

translation.en: Sorry, I have to go. We'll talk some other time.
translation.ja: 〈急いでるからまたあとでね〉

translation.en: [in English] Why you wake up late, so?
[in Kamtok] You had too much work yesterday?
I have repaired the engine. The new kick-starter is working fine.
translation.ja: エンジンを直したからかかりがいい

translation.en: -What did you say? -Where is your father?
[woman in Kamtok] Please serve my fish, I have to go.
Madam, I beg you. If you can't wait, then you go to a different place.
translation.ja: 〈待てないならよそへ行って〉

translation.en: [in English] I said, if you no feel wait, then you go different place.
translation.ja: 待てないなら よそへ行って

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I'm leaving. [in English] Give my money.
[in Kamtok] Didn't I pay you? [in English] Give my balance.
Madam, I beg no just start.
[in Kamtok] You never give me nothing, and you can't trick me. Never!
translation.ja: 〈一銭も もらってません〉

translation.en: -Madam, please don't be mad. -If not for you, I would have left.
translation.ja: 〈怒らないでくれ〉 〈あなたに免じて〉

translation.en: -I'll serve you-- she forgot. -It is only because of you. Don't be angry, please understand.
translation.ja: 〈娘がうっかりしただけだ怒らないで〉

translation.en: [in English] She buy fish for 3,000. She give 5,000. Give balance.
translation.ja: 〈魚が3000フランで5000もらったら おつりを〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] So, she even has the change.
Please don't be angry. Please understand.
[in Kamtok] This is a joke, right? [in English] You know time?
[in Kamtok] Lucas, I didn't come here to joke with you.
translation.ja: 〈冗談のために来たんじゃない〉

translation.en: You can't ask for a debt, at this time. Ah-ah.
I gave you the money in these times.
[in Kamtok] Based on calculations, I can only pay you next month.
I don't have the money now.
[in Kamtok] Lucas, enough of your stupid jokes.
I am not joking. I don't have money. Next month.
Lucas, you are a liar. [in English] Lucas, you lie.
[in Kamtok] Don't we see you selling coconut water by the sea every day?
translation.ja: 〈毎日 川岸で商売してるだろ〉

translation.en: [in English] Who give you the power to come to my compound, and curse me? I do owe you?
translation.ja: 〈よくも侮辱したなお前に借金したか？〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Lucas, Mustapha is telling the truth.
translation.ja: 〈ムスタファの言い分が正しい〉

translation.en: You cannot dribble me like Samuel Eto'o, on a football pitch.
translation.ja: 〈俺を手玉に取れると思うな〉

translation.en: Lucas, if you don't pay my money...
[in English] You come my house, you can't threaten me.
[in English] I go cover my eye... I'll count from one to five.
translation.ja: 〈俺は目をつぶって５まで数える〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] When I open my eyes, and you're still here, I promise you...
one of you will be dead.
Eh, what is this? [in Kamtok] You don't know how to joke?
[in English] Eh, my brother. [in Kamtok] Let's fix this like men...
translation.ja: 〈兄弟同然だろ男らしく解決しよう〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] My brother, you will be dead if you don't pay my money.
translation.ja: 〈兄弟よ　金を返さないなら死んでもらう〉

translation.en: [in English] OK. OK. [in Kamtok] The money is in my pocket.
[in Kamtok] Let's fix this like brothers. Please.
Four thousand? [in Kamtok] You owe me 70,000.
[in English] Sule, that's all I have.
I tell you... you give me some time, no?
translation.ja: 〈有り金の全部だ〉 〈頼むから少し待ってくれ〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That's all I have right now.
Lucas, you must finish paying me my money.
[in English] OK. You go take firewood?
You're not gonna need to buy firewood again for two year.
[in Kamtok] Drink it while it's still hot.
It will cure your cough. Drink it.
[in Kamtok] Is something disturbing you? You look worried.
translation.ja: 〈何を考えてるんだ心配事でも？〉

translation.en: The misunderstanding with that woman should not disturb you.
translation.ja: 〈昼間の客のことなら気にするな〉

translation.en: You were too busy. So you got confused.
translation.ja: 〈お前は忙しすぎて混乱しただけだ〉

translation.en: Do you understand? Don't worry, drink up.
translation.ja: 〈だから気にするな　飲め〉

translation.en: Drink it before it gets cold [in English] Drink.
I want to go to school.
School is not for fish people like we.
[in Kamtok] That is a bad idea.
What will those same people say...
when I go to school and start making money?
translation.ja: 〈私が卒業して稼ぎ始めたら？〉

translation.en: I mean, a lot of money.
Nobody in this house would need to go fishing, every day, 24/7.
translation.ja: 〈この家の誰も漁に出なくて済むほどにね〉

translation.en: Our lives would be changed forever.
Solo. They say, a blind person cannot lead another.
translation.ja: 〈“盲人が盲人を道案内したら”どうなる？〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] What would happen when we got old and couldn't go fishing?
translation.ja: 〈年老いたら どうする？〉 〈漁には出られない〉

translation.en: God has blessed us with just one kid.
What God has blessed us with, is fishing.
translation.ja: 〈俺たちが授かったのは漁という仕事だ〉

translation.en: [in English] You say you want to go to school...
You asked me the other time, if I like your mama.
translation.ja: ママを愛してるかと聞いたよな

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Do you want to know the answer now?
[in English] I never ever liked my skin.
[in Kamtok] Every love and care I had...
translation.ja: 〈愛情と思いやりのすべてを―〉

translation.en: I gave it to your mother.
When my mother and brother Lucas tried to say anything bad about her,
translation.ja: 〈母親がママの悪口を言おうとした時は〉

translation.en: I kicked my mother out of the house.
Nobody loves your mother more than me.
And not even you. You don't love her more than I do.
translation.ja: 〈お前だって俺ほどママを愛せない〉

translation.en: It seems the devil took over her.
She started talking to me like a mad woman.
has accepted to pay every dime you spent on me,
translation.ja: あなたが私に費やしたお金を全額支払う

translation.en: including interest. -I will pay you back. -No, no, no.
[in Kamtok] No, you can't utter such words.
I beg. [in Kamtok] Let me go.
-That man doesn't love you... -Please, hold it!
translation.ja: 〈あの男に愛されてない〉 〈やめて〉

translation.en: [in English] Do I look like a kid? Oh, you want to teach me about love?
translation.ja: 愛を説くなんて子供だと？

translation.en: This whole place is a mental prison.
I wouldn't want her to suffocate in this madness.
I will die first... [in Kamtok] ...than let you make the same mistakes as your mother.
translation.ja: 〈同じ過ちを許すくらいなら死ぬ〉
絶対にダメだ　いいな

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You hear me? You hear me?!
translation.ja: 絶対にダメだ　いいな いいな？

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you. -[in Kamtok] I'm sorry, too.
Didn't you say you do not want to go to school?
translation.ja: 〈この前 学校は嫌だって〉
昨日 私の伯父さんが来て

translation.en: and made a big deal out of it.
When my father died in the fishing waters,
translation.ja: 〈伯父さんはパパが死んだ時に誓った〉

translation.en: my uncle promised to send me to school.
He has been sending money for school fees, but my mom has been spending it.
translation.ja: 〈でもママが学費を使い込んでた〉

translation.en: then this morning he went and paid my school fees.
translation.ja: 〈そして今朝授業料を支払った〉

translation.en: I had no idea what the teacher was saying.
translation.ja: 〈先生の言うことがさっぱり〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I was in class but thinking about us.
How we were free and enjoying being by the seaside.
[teacher, in English] What are the factors of six?
What are the factors of six?
[teacher] Factors of six, I started with one.
[teacher] So the factors of six will be...
So, we have learned the factors of six. Now...
translation.ja: 私たちは６の約数を学びました

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Take this 300 francs and buy something for yourself.
-[in Kamtok] Go home and cook, I'm hungry. -[in English] Papa, I already cooked.
translation.ja: 〈家で食事の用意を〉 〈できてる〉

translation.en: -How about dirty clothes then? -Alreadty washed them.
[in Kamtok] OK. Go home and have some deserved rest.
translation.ja: 〈それじゃあ家で休んでいいぞ〉

translation.en: [teacher, in English] If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.ja: １人で１ヘクタールの土地を２時間かけて開墾

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear that same portion of land?
translation.ja: 同じ土地を４人で開墾したら何分かかる？ 同じ土地を４人で開墾したら何分かかる？ 〝算数〞

translation.en: If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.ja: １人で２時間かけて開墾しました

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ja: ４人なら何分かかる？ さっきと同じ土地を開墾します

translation.en: -Two hours to clear a hectare of land... -[Ekah] Thirty minutes!

translation.ja: ほら 教室に入って

translation.en: I was thinking you'd forgotten about me.
This fish keeps reducing every day.
Are you sure this is fish for 2,000 francs?

translation.ja: 誰にも ウソはやめて

translation.en: You can't tell me you learnt arithmetic by giving change to your customers.
translation.ja: おつりのやりとりから算数は学べない
私から どうやって？

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I peep through the window every day to learn.
[in English] Is that how you learned arithmetic?
If one girl takes one hour to wash 50 plates...
translation.ja: 50枚の皿を洗うのに１人１時間かかるとしたら

translation.en: how long will three girls take to wash those similar number of plates?
translation.ja: 同じ枚数を３人で洗う時かかる時間は？

translation.en: Four people are standing in line.
John is three meters behind Laura
translation.ja: ジョンはローラの３メートル後ろで

translation.en: and two meters in front of Peter.
translation.ja: ピーターの２メートル前

translation.en: Paul is four meters in front of Laura.
translation.ja: ポールはローラの４メートル前

translation.en: What is the distance between Peter and Paul?
translation.ja: ピーターとポールの距離は？

translation.en: Does your father know about this?
I need that money before the deadline.
translation.ja: 〈借金の返済期限が迫ってる〉

translation.en: If I had that kind of money, Ekah would get a new fish barn.
translation.ja: 〈それだけあれば魚納屋を買える〉
そんな金ないよ　無理だ

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] What are you doing here? -[in English] Good afternoon.
-Do I need permission? -[in Kamtok] Not at all.
translation.ja: 許可が必要ですか？ 〈まさか〉

translation.en: Just that people like you only come out on special occasions.
translation.ja: 〈だが 先生のような人は特別な時にしか来ない〉

translation.en: [in English] I came so that you and I could talk.
translation.ja: お父様に話があります

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If you have anything to say, tell him here.
[in English] I am not talking to you, please.
[in Kamtok] Teacher Bihbih, if there is something, just say it here.
translation.ja: 〈先生 話があるならここで言ってください〉

translation.en: Have a seat, so you can be offered a drink.
-Have a seat. -[in English] No, I'm fine. Thank you.
Actually, I came so that you and I could talk something very important about your daughter.
translation.ja: 娘さんのことで大事なお話があります

translation.en: [in Kamtok] In my family, we do not cheat.
The fish we give you is the right size.
translation.ja: ほかの人と同じ魚を先生にも売ってる

translation.en: [in English] Everything is fine. In fact, even better. Yes.
translation.ja: 何も問題ありません期待以上です

translation.en: We thank God. [in Kamtok] Have a glass of palm wine.
translation.ja: 〈何よりですではヤシ酒でも飲んで〉

translation.en: that child, she could be the next big thing in this village.
translation.ja: エカは この村で話題の人になるかも

translation.en: [in Kamtok] All this time that I taught,
I had no idea Ekah watched through a hole to learn.
[in English] My Ekah come to your school?
And the good thing about it is, I asked some very hard question today...
translation.ja: しかも難しい問題を出したら

translation.en: And to even be more sure, I asked more question...
translation.ja: 別の問題も出してみましたが

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...and she answered all of them.
Are you out of your mind?
[in English] I'm not joking. I'm very serious.
translation.ja: 真剣にお話をしてます

translation.en: In fact, you should get her enrolled in school.
She could benefit from the opportunities, other people, in school.
translation.ja: 学校生活はエカのためになります

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Why do bad luck always choose your house?
translation.ja: 〈お前の家にばかりなぜ不運が？〉

translation.en: [in English] Again and again. [in Kamtok] Before it was Barbara,
translation.ja: 何度も　最初はバーバラ

translation.en: [in English] My Ekah go to school?
Everywhere, school, school, school. If school was that good, you will not be dressed like this.
translation.ja: 〈そんなに学校がいいならこの格好は何だ〉

translation.en: You look like a replica of Pinocchio! Nonsense, sit down!
translation.ja: 〈まるで愚かなピノキオだ座ってろ〉
パパ 痛い やめて　パパ…

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You want to become like your mother?
translation.ja: 〈ママみたいに強情になるか？〉

translation.en: -[in English] No, Papa. No. -[in Kamtok] You want to be stubborn?
translation.ja: 〈ママみたいに強情になるか？〉 嫌だ

translation.en: Lay down there! I said, lay down!
[in Kamtok] Will you set your foot in that school again?
[in Kamtok] Will you go to that class again?
-I can't hear you! -I will never go there again, Papa!
translation.ja: 〈答えろ　どうなんだ〉 〈また学校へ行くつもりか？〉

translation.en: Will I see you in that school again?
I will never go there again, Papa! I promise!

translation.ja: 〈聞こえない〉 〈もう行きません〉

translation.en: -Solo, you are a strong man. -[Ekah crying]
-You are a strong man. -[Ekah continues crying]
Solo, you are a strong man.
[in Kamtok] I want to warn you to stay away from my family.
Don't put your madness in my daughter's head.
I love her the way she is.
I'm warning you for the last time.
This is what I don't like.
[in Kamtok] You are becoming too stubborn.
Ekah got me really angry. I got her well beaten.
I witnessed it. You did the right thing.
I do the same to my boys when they are stubborn.
Anchor the canoe on the other side.
translation.ja: 〈カヌーを向こうに固定してくれ〉

translation.en: When I remember what my Barbara do for me,
and I see Ekah do the same things,
I don't like. I don't like.
translation.ja: 俺は嫌だ　絶対に嫌だ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I didn't know I still had this much anger in me.
[in English] No worry, Solo. No worry.
You need to keep this kid on her toes.
Don't let her become like your wife, Barbara.
translation.ja: 〈バーバラの二の舞を許すな〉

translation.en: If I were you, I would desecrate on Barbara's grave.
translation.ja: 〈俺ならバーバラの墓を汚(けが)す〉

translation.en: [in English] Teach sense in her head.
So how are you managing with the school?
Everything is going on fine in your absence, sir.
translation.ja: お留守の間も問題なく
ビ先生 ご承知のとおり
ビ先生 ご承知のとおり この学校は血と汗と涙の結晶だ

translation.en: was established out of sweat, tears, and blood.
translation.ja: この学校は血と汗と涙の結晶だ

translation.en: I fought through a battle of hell to get these fish people,
translation.ja: 抵抗する漁民を説得して

translation.en: to establish the roots of the school here.
I will do everything possible not to get into trouble with them.
translation.ja: もめ事は何としても避けたい

translation.en: Now I have been informed that there's a girl here by the name of Ekah,
translation.ja: 聞いたぞ エカという子が父親の許可なく授業に出たと

translation.en: who has been attending classes without her father's permission--
translation.ja: エカという子が父親の許可なく授業に出たと

translation.en: We'll not establish any confrontational habits in front of these people.
translation.ja: 地元民の反感を買うことは避けたい

translation.en: No child will step his or her feet on these premises without their parents' consent.
translation.ja: 親の承諾もなく子供を教室に入れないこと
分かったな　ビ先生

translation.en: I chose you as the lone teacher of this school,
not because your performance was outstanding amongst delegation, but because of your firmness.
translation.ja: 君の傑出した能力ではなく強固な姿勢が理由だ

translation.en: Please. I beg of you. Do not make me have a rethink.
translation.ja: 先生の交代を検討させないでくれ
分かりました よし

translation.en: So what were you going to say?
And how are the children fairing-- Are they getting set for the exams?
translation.ja: テストに向けて習熟度は？

translation.en: I'm doing my very best, sir.
You may go back to class.
[Bihbih] If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.ja: １人で１ヘクタールの土地を２時間かけて開墾

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ja: 同じ土地を４人で開墾したら― 何分かかる？

translation.en: If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
translation.ja: １人で１ヘクタールの土地を２時間かけて開墾

translation.en: how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ja: 同じ土地を４人で開墾したら何分かかる？

translation.en: Have you taken the medicine I prepared for you?
[in Kamtok] Did you manage to cook food?
[in Kamtok] I did everything as assigned,
I even mended a few nets.
I think I can go fishing with you tomorrow.
Huh, heat my food, I'm hungry.
translation.ja: 〈食事を温めろ　腹ペコだ〉

translation.en: I knew you would be coming back at this time.
[in English] But... [in Kamtok] It's good you take a shower first, before I serve your food.
Warm water is already in the bathroom.
[in Kamtok] Teacher. Please, I want to learn.
I cannot help you as it is.
translation.ja: 力には なれないの

translation.en: We cannot even be seen together.
[in Kamtok] They say those who go to school can change their families...
translation.ja: 〈学校へ行くと家族を変えられるそうです〉

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] Teacher, please help me. -[in English] Wake up. Wake up. Wake up.
translation.ja: 〈お願い…〉 ダメよ　ほら立って

translation.en: You don't have to kneel before I help you.
I freely want to help you, Ekah.
translation.ja: あなたの力になりたい

translation.en: But it's not in my power to do that.
translation.ja: でも私の力では及ばない

translation.en: You don't want me losing my job, do you?
translation.ja: 私に職を失えと言うの？

translation.en: Have you brought my brother's money?
That's why I have come to see you,
so together we can come to a one-time solution.
translation.ja: 〈今ならとびきりの解決策がある〉

translation.en: Many days have elapsed, and you still haven't brought my money.
-You think I'm stupid, right? -[in English] No. No...
translation.ja: 〈俺がバカだと？〉 思ってないよ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I can call two of my boys, to roughen you up.
I think it's time I allow Mustapha to deal with you.
translation.ja: 〈ムスタファにお前を任せてもいい〉

translation.en: I came here for a reason.
What I have to tell you is better than money.
translation.ja: 〈金よりもいい話があるんだ〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You take us for fools?
[in Arabic] I swear. [in Kamtok] Sule, this guy wants to sell us wood.
translation.ja: 〈分かったぞ薪を売らせる気だ〉

translation.en: No, I don't want to sell you wood. Mr. Sule, look.
translation.ja: 〈薪じゃない〉 〈スレ いいか〉
あんたは いい人だ

translation.en: You have a good heart. Just like that of Jesus Christ.
translation.ja: イエス･キリストのように善良だ

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] You call me Jesus Christ? -[in English] No. No.
[in Kamtok] I wanted to say, you have a good heart like Prophet Muhammad.
translation.ja: 預言者ムハンマドのように善良だ

translation.en: Both of you have a heart like that of Prophet Muhammad.
translation.ja: 〈２人ともムハンマドの心がある〉

translation.en: That's what I wanted to say.
You say I have a heart,
translation.ja: 〈俺の心がムハンマドのようだと？〉

translation.en: -like that of Prophet Muhammad? -Yes, that's true.
translation.ja: 〈俺の心がムハンマドのようだと？〉 〈そのとおり〉

translation.en: A good heart like that of Holy Prophet Muhammad. I swear.
translation.ja: ムハンマドのように善良だ

translation.en: What do you want to tell me, that is better than my money?
It's a private talk, just our ears.
translation.ja: 〈あんたと俺だけの話だ内密にしたい〉

translation.en: [in English] Who can come up to the board and show us how to solve this?
translation.ja: この計算を解ける人は？

translation.en: Can someone come up to the board and show us how to solve this simple problem?
translation.ja: 誰か前に出てこの簡単な計算を解いて

translation.en: This is something we have been studying for weeks,
and this is the same thing that will come in your exams next week.
translation.ja: 来週のテストにも出るわよ

translation.en: Can anyone come up to the board and show us how to solve this?
translation.ja: 前に出て解ける人はいないの？

translation.en: I taught you this some weeks ago,
so everybody should be able to come to the board to solve this.
translation.ja: 全員 解けなきゃダメでしょ

translation.en: Simple problem. I taught you this a while ago and nobody can remember. Show me your hand.
translation.ja: 〈教えたのに誰もできない手を出して〉

translation.en: Next, next... show me your hand.
translation.ja: あなたも 手を出して

translation.en: How you come back so quick so?
-[in Kamtok] How did the exams go? -Solomon,
I told you my name is not Barbara.
There is, but it's still cold.
[in English] So you expect me to come back from school and eat cold food?
translation.ja: 学校から帰って冷たい食事？

translation.en: If you wait, ma'a, I finish sewing my trousa, I-I will warm it for you.
translation.ja: 〈トロッサを縫い終わったら温める〉
“トロッサ”じゃなく“トラウザー”よ

translation.en: Why is it so difficult for you to understand simple teachings?
translation.ja: こんな簡単なことも分からないの？

translation.en: Illiteracy, they say, is brother to madness.
Nah. [in Wum] It can't happen to my daughter...
[in Wum] Who's a big fool now?
[in English] What are you doing here at this time?
I thought I told you we cannot be seen together.
Then what are you doing here at this time, alone?
You're good in calculations, but you're still lagging in reading and spelling.
translation.ja: 計算は得意だけど 読み書きは まだね

translation.en: Ekah, I thought I told you we can't--
[in Kamtok] I will do whatever you want.
[Bihbih, in English] Just teaching how to sound.
translation.ja: 発音の勉強よ　これは…

translation.en: If you put it together, it will give you "sh."
You have to put your mouth like this. "Shh."

translation.ja: “少女１人で不可能なわけがない”
“少女１人で不可能なわけがない” すばらしい

translation.en: "If one man can destroy the world,
why can't one girl change it?”
translation.ja: “少女１人で不可能なわけがない”

translation.en: Let me rush to the meeting before it starts raining.
translation.ja: 雨が降る前に出かけてくる

translation.en: You understand? Huh. I will be back.
I will check it when I rest, OK?
If I ask you a question?
[Bihbih] Malala Yousafzai is a Pakistani girl,
translation.ja: マララ･ユスフザイはパキスタンの女性で

translation.en: who became an advocate for girls' education,
translation.ja: 女子教育の提唱者になった

translation.en: even when since she was still young.
This resulted to the Taliban terrorist group
translation.ja: その結果テロ組織のタリバンは―

translation.en: issuing a death threat against her.
translation.ja: マララに殺害予告を出した

translation.en: She was known for her focus,
translation.ja: 彼女には目的意識と固い決意があり

translation.en: her determination and her wish for every girl child to be educated.
translation.ja: 彼女には目的意識と固い決意があり すべての少女に教育を望んだ

translation.en: even after she was shot by this terrorist group because of her views.
translation.ja: テロ組織に撃たれたあとでもね

translation.en: The extremists are afraid of books and pens.
translation.ja: 過激派は本とペンを恐れてる

translation.en: The power of education frightens them.
translation.ja: 教育の力が彼らの脅威となる
彼らは女性が怖いのよ

translation.en: -Where is Ekah? -[in English] What nonsense is this?
[in Kamtok] You think I came here for jokes?
-[in English] Ekah is not here. -[Lucas] Bihbih?
translation.ja: エカはいない ビビ

translation.en: No one should step into my room.
[in Kamtok] She is not here, Lucas. Let's go home.
[in Kamtok] I will beat you until your mother's bad genes are out.
translation.ja: 〈悪い遺伝子が消えるまで殴る〉

translation.en: [in English] What have you done? What have you done!
translation.ja: 何てことだ 何てことを

translation.en: You disrespect me and you put this entire institution into jeopardy?
translation.ja: 忠告したのに学校を危険にさらすか？

translation.en: -Sir, this kid is different. -So bloody what?
translation.ja: あの子は特別です だから何だ

translation.en: Listen to me. We will not stake this school
translation.ja: この学校と生徒の未来を賭けたりしない

translation.en: and the future of every other children because of one girl.
translation.ja: この学校と生徒の未来を賭けたりしない 少女１人のためにな

translation.en: Hear me out. I repeat. We will not!
translation.ja: よく聞け　絶対に賭けない

translation.en: But I didn't even teach her on the premise.
Who bloody cares where you taught her? Who bloody cares?
translation.ja: どこで教えようが知ったことか

translation.en: I can see you prefer your little tangle of that little fish girl
translation.ja: あの子と交流したいようだ

translation.en: rather than the interest of this institution. Isn't that so?
I have had it up to here. I've had it up to here because of your insubordination.
translation.ja: その反抗的な態度には我慢できない

translation.en: I'm writing against you. I'm writing a letter against you to the inspector of basic education. Have you heard me?
translation.ja: 基礎教育学校の視察官に君のことを報告する

translation.en: She is a child like every other, and she came to me, not once, not twice.
translation.ja: エカだって子供です何度も私の所へ

translation.en: She has every right to be educated like every other child.
translation.ja: 教育を受ける権利は彼女にもある

translation.en: Now, listen to me. I will not fall for that emotional blackmail. Have you heard me?
translation.ja: その手に乗るか情に訴えて脅しても無駄だ

translation.en: You will not remain employed in these premises, not any longer.
translation.ja: ここでは もう君を雇わない

translation.en: I will use every connection I can muster to remove you,
translation.ja: あらゆる人脈を使って 君をここから追い出す
君をここから追い出す

translation.en: If you like use all the networks you have.
translation.ja: コネでも何でも使えばいい

translation.en: And you, what are you looking at, look forward.
translation.ja: 何を見てるの？　前を向いて

translation.en: This is not good at all.
This is terrible, and bad for our image.
translation.ja: 我々の印象を著しく損ねる

translation.en: This just goes to show how unserious we are.
translation.ja: 不真面目さを示している

translation.en: But I've been doing my best, sir.
Well, your best is clearly not good enough, Madam Bih.
translation.ja: 明らかに力不足だ　ビ先生

translation.en: It's obvious. It shows in their results.
Very appalling results. Not even 12 over 20?
translation.ja: 正答率が６割にも満たない

translation.en: This automatically just disqualifies us from Bamenda.
translation.ja: 学力大会の出場資格を失う

translation.en: I am not happy. I am not happy with you at all.
translation.ja: 君には がっかりした

translation.en: Ha. How come you say there is no one brilliant among the student?
This is a very good result.
Yes, it's very good and it gives us a ray of hope. You should work on her.
translation.ja: 希望が見えたぞ　この子だ

translation.en: This is very good. Work on her some more.
translation.ja: いいぞ　もっと教えろ
残念ながら無理です なぜだ

translation.en: That is the score she had in the same exam our pupils took.
translation.ja: 同じテストを受けた結果です

translation.en: But... But, sir, she can still stand in.
translation.ja: 彼女にもまだ資格はあります

translation.en: Bih. Is it that I talk too fast or you listen too slow?
translation.ja: 私の話についてこられないのか？

translation.en: Rules are rules and we are not going to break them, do you understand me?
translation.ja: ルールは曲げられない

translation.en: You must do everything in your power to prepare a registered kid.
translation.ja: 手を尽くして大会出場者を仕込め

translation.en: Those people have not still fixed the light?
I looked for you at the seaside today to no avail.
I decided to stay home and keep an eye on Ekah.
She has been locked up in the room.
How long will you keep an eye on her?
I don't look for trouble, but bad things keep happening to me.
translation.ja: 〈求めてないのに悪いことばかり〉

translation.en: [in English] I think, say, I know how we can handle this Ekah matter.
translation.ja: 〈エカの問題を解決する方法がある〉

translation.en: we should give her to someone who can control her better.
translation.ja: 〈制御できる人の手に渡すんだ〉

translation.en: [in English] You want me to give Ekah for marriage?
No. [in Kamtok] I can't do that.
translation.ja: ダメだ　それはできない
〈考えてみろ　考えるんだ〉

translation.en: [in English] My Ekah? [in Kamtok] Our "little mother"?
translation.ja: 〈俺たちの小さな母ちゃんを？〉

translation.en: Marry her off at this age?
If you marry her off, the responsibility will not be on you anymore.
translation.ja: 〈嫁がせればもう責任を取らなくていい〉

translation.en: The shame wouldn't be on you, like the case of your late wife, Barbara.
translation.ja: 〈恥をかかない〉 〈バーバラの場合と違ってな〉

translation.en: I don't want anyone to abuse my child.
[in English] Leave that all for me.
[in Kamtok] I will fix that. You can count on me.
Look, Solo, [in English] I like the way you'd handle Ekah matter.
[in Kamtok] You are a strong man.
Our late parents must be very proud of you.
translation.ja: 〈亡き両親も誇りに思うはずだ〉

translation.en: [man on phone] Good afternoon, Mr. Anang.
translation.ja: こんにちは　アナン君

translation.en: I trust you and your family are very well.
I am calling with respect to the Bamenda event.
translation.ja: 学力大会の件で電話した
日程も決まりあとは出場者だ

translation.en: and we're looking forward to receiving your representative as soon as you can.
translation.ja: 日程も決まりあとは出場者だ すぐに報告を

translation.en: Nine days from now, and all eyes are on the new institution,
translation.ja: ９日後だぞ 君の新しい学校に期待してるんだ
君の新しい学校に期待してるんだ
宿と校舎の修繕も任せろ

translation.en: Have a nice day, Mr. Anang.
translation.ja: いい日を　アナン君

translation.en: You too, sir. Than you very much, sir.
translation.ja: あなたも　それでは

translation.en: Who was that on the phone?
We had a meeting last week and I spoke very highly and proudly of the school.
translation.ja: 先週の会議で私は学校を大いに自慢した

translation.en: Because of that, all eyes are directed on us,
especially with the coming of the Bamenda Brain Box Competition.
translation.ja: 特にバメンダで開催される大会でね

translation.en: You speak like the children are not ready.
translation.ja: 確か出場できる子がいないって

translation.en: So, what are you going to do now?
You didn't get a glass for yourself?
Do you know the meaning of LCM?

translation.ja: じゃあ 別の問題を
最小公倍数(ＨＣＦ)なら どうだ

translation.en: What is the meaning of HCF?
You don't know the meaning of HCF?
You don't know the meaning of LCM or HCF?
Let me ask you something very simple.
what is the past participle of, uh, "see"?
Can-can you even spell your name?
Flown out potatoes. That's what they are.
Not even one of them can try?
Not even one. They don't even know what LCM is.
Not to even talk of... a long and short division.
translation.ja: もちろん長除法と短除法も

translation.en: If you ask them the past participle of "see,"
just call the board of inspectors and tell them you are not yet set.
translation.ja: まだ準備ができてないと視察団に連絡したら？

translation.en: That is not even an option right now.
I know you are a man of integrity,
translation.ja: あなたの高潔な人柄は分かってる

translation.en: but I think you should consider considering that, uh...
translation.ja: でも考えてみたほうがいい

translation.en: I think she's your ace card at the moment.
translation.ja: 現時点での切り札だと思う

translation.en: I cannot believe you uttered such nonsense.
translation.ja: そんなバカげた話がよくできたな

translation.en: The school must be represented at the Brain Box competition. Yes.
translation.ja: だが学力大会の欠場は許されない

translation.en: That's why he deemed it necessary to call me in the first place, even though the event is on the calendar,
translation.ja: だから視察官はわざわざ電話をよこした

translation.en: and I was there at the planning meeting last month.
translation.ja: 先月 会議で同席したのに

translation.en: He wants to have it on record that I failed.
translation.ja: 私に汚点をつけたいんだ
あなたって融通が利かない

translation.en: Anyway, you either use the little girl Ekah,
translation.ja: とにかく エカを採用するか

translation.en: or face the shame of your school not being represented at the competition this year.
translation.ja: 欠場という恥に向き合うかどちらかでしょ

translation.en: I am off to the kitchen.

translation.ja: どうも　大丈夫ですか？

translation.en: -Would you like to come inside? -Oh, no. No, no, no.
translation.ja: 中へ いや　いいんだ

translation.en: Let's-- Let's-- We can talk about it here.
translation.ja: ここでいい　話をしよう

translation.en: First of all, uh, let me,
let me apologize profusely for the way I talked to you the last time. I am really sorry, it was, uh...
translation.ja: 先日は ひどい言い方をして申し訳なかった

translation.en: At this point, I just-- I've come to realize the frustrations and the...
translation.ja: やっと君の葛藤に気付いたんだ

translation.en: yearnings of a tutor when she finds a brilliant kid, as she tries to impart them.
translation.ja: 優秀な子を見つけた指導者の切々たる声にね

translation.en: I am at a crossroad here,
it's either we win it all,
If I may confide in you, please tell me,
translation.ja: 信頼できる意見をくれ

translation.en: what do you think of this girl Diana?
Actually, sir, she is very good.
I've covered more with her than the other pupils in my class.
translation.ja: 学校の授業よりも進んでいます

translation.en: could you reach out to her parents and get their consent?
translation.ja: 親の承諾を取ってもらえるか？

translation.en: We are not only going to the Brain competition to participate,
translation.ja: 大会に出場するだけじゃない

translation.en: we must make a memorable impression.
translation.ja: 強烈な印象を残すんだ
はい　もちろんです

translation.en: [in Kamtok] have decided you will go live with Alhaji Sule.
-[in English] Why? -You will be woman, my dear.
[Lucas] That will happen for all woman. You be woman now.
translation.ja: 〈みんな嫁ぐ　もう大人だ〉

translation.en: No, [in Kamtok] I am a girl.
Any girl who is as stubborn as you, is not a girl anymore.
translation.ja: 〈それだけ頑固なら子供じゃない〉

translation.en: Papa. Please, I will never visit teacher Bihbih again.
translation.ja: 〈二度と先生には会いに行かない〉

translation.en: This is the best thing for you.
Everyone knows Alhaji Sule is a rich man.
translation.ja: 〈スレは誰もが知る金持ちだし〉

translation.en: [in English] Now fine married, he go take care for you.
translation.ja: 〈いい人だからお前を大切にする〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I'm not ready to have a child. I will not be stubborn anymore.
translation.ja: 〈まだ出産は無理〉 〈いい子にするから〉

translation.en: Don't abandon me. I will never go to that school.
translation.ja: 〈もう絶対に学校へ行かない〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Papa, please don't abandon me.
I will not be your papa again.
Papa, I promise you, I will never touch any book.
translation.ja: 〈本には触らないからお願い〉

translation.en: [in English] I swear to God, I'm not going to even look at Teacher Bihbih again.
translation.ja: 〈本には触らないからお願い〉 〈先生のことは見もしない〉

translation.en: Papa, please don't do this to me.
I want to see Mr. Solomon.
translation.ja: ソロモンさんにお話が

translation.en: [in English] Why you want to see?
-[in Kamtok] How else do you want us-- -[in English] Please.
translation.ja: ほかに俺たちに… どうか お願いです
どうか お願いです

translation.en: There is a competition coming up, and she stands the chance to win.
translation.ja: エカは学力大会で優勝できます

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Ekah is not one of your students.
But the most important thing is we can get her registered and then she will be a part of the--
translation.ja: でも入学させればエカも生徒の一員に…

translation.en: She stands the chance to win 150,000 francs.
translation.ja: エカは15万フランを獲得する可能性がある

translation.en: Teacher. [in Kamtok] Those are little tricks for kids.
Why would they give Ekah 150,000 when you can keep it to yourself?
translation.ja: エカに15万もくれるヤツがどこにいる

translation.en: Leave this place. Don't disturb my peace again.
translation.ja: 帰れ　二度と来るな

translation.en: [Ekah, in English] Teacher Bihbih, Teacher Bihbih. [in Kamtok] Teacher, please don't leave me here.
translation.ja: 〈ビビ先生私を置いていかないで〉

translation.en: -Ekah... -They locked me up in the room.
Why you have to lock her up?
Why do you people have to lock her up?
[in Kamtok] It's none of your business. Nobody invited you into this.
[in English] Mr. Lucas, this-- this is barbaric.
translation.ja: ルカスさんこんなの野蛮です

translation.en: [in English] I don't want marriage, I don't want marriage.
translation.ja: 〈結婚したくない　嫌だよ〉

translation.en: You cannot be doing this kind of thing.
I am very well respected here.
If I ask anyone to jump, they jump.
If I tell them to eat debris, they do it without hesitation.
translation.ja: 〈ゴミを食えと言えばためらずに食う〉

translation.en: Don't come here and try to tell me what to do.
translation.ja: 〈ゴミを食えと言えばためらずに食う〉 〈俺に指図しようと思うな〉

translation.en: This is none of your business. Leave this place.
Lucas, you cannot marry her off.
She is only 12. I cannot accept that. I cannot accept that.
translation.ja: まだエカは12歳なのよ 許さない

translation.en: Lucas, I cannot accept it. You cannot marry Ekah off.
translation.ja: エカの結婚なんて絶対に許さない

translation.en: You cannot do that. This is barbaric. This is barbaric.
translation.ja: エカの結婚なんて絶対に許さない こんなの野蛮よ　許せない
こんなの野蛮よ　許せない

translation.en: Cross the line. [in Kamtok] I dare you to cross that line.
Madam Bih. [in English] Please tell me something good.
translation.ja: ビ先生 いい知らせを頼むよ

translation.en: They have locked her up waiting to be delivered to her husband, sir.
translation.ja: エカは監禁され 嫁ぐことに

translation.en: How can people be so evil?
It's a common practice for them.
translation.ja: 彼らには普通なんです

translation.en: Most of the young girls don't even see anything wrong with it.
translation.ja: 疑問に思う女の子も少ない

translation.en: And what really squeezes my heart is, how they want to bury such a dream.
translation.ja: こんな方法で夢を埋没させるなんて

translation.en: Ignorance, they say, is very expensive.
translation.ja: 無学で失うものが大きすぎます

translation.en: I can't think, sir. I ca-- I can't think.
Please, sir, can I have some water to drink?
-Search the whole house. -Are you out of your mind?
If I hear pin from you again,
[in Kamtok] you will know what I am capable of!
[in English] Ekah is not here. I've had enough of this brutality. Stop embarrassing me.
translation.ja: エカはいませんこんな蛮行は十分です

translation.en: Don't even try me yet! Don't even try me!
[Bihbih] I said, Ekah is not here.
I told you Ekah is not here, now leave my house.
translation.ja: 言ったでしょ　出てって

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Bihbih, my brother, Sule must have his bride.
Let's go before Ekah runs too far.
translation.ja: ルカス 行くぞ 〈エカが逃げる〉

translation.en: If I find out you helped Ekah to run away from marriage,
translation.ja: 〈エカを逃がしたと分かれば―〉

translation.en: You understand? I will shut it down.
-Hello, uncle. -[in English] You don't see Ekah?
[in Kamtok] I just saw her running towards the seaside.
Can you help me cross to the other side?
Are you talking about Solomon's daughter?
We have to cross over. There's no time.
translation.ja: 〈向こうに渡るしかない〉 〈急がないと〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Think very well. Are you sure Ekah left?
Or is she hiding somewhere here?
She crossed over, sir. With another canoeist--
Do you know this other canoeist...
What's his name again, I think Efofa?
I am not lying, she crossed over.
translation.ja: 〈ウソじゃない〉 〈エカは向こうに渡った〉

translation.en: [in English] Why are you looking me so, grand? You look me as you think I lie.
I swear to God, if I am lying,
translation.ja: 〈誓うよ〉 〈ウソだったら母親が雷に打たれてもいい〉

translation.en: let my mother be stricken by thunder.
translation.ja: 〈ウソだったら母親が雷に打たれてもいい〉

translation.en: -What are you doing? -[in English] Remove your clothes!
If I tell you I am not confused, then I'll be a liar.
translation.ja: 正直なところ戸惑っている

translation.en: We stand to lose a lot if we do not participate.
translation.ja: 欠場すれば多くを失うことになる

translation.en: We stand to be mocked and undermined if we send in a dormant candidate.
translation.ja: 不出来な生徒を送り込めば我々がバカにされる

translation.en: we cannot go for a competition for another three years, so tell me...
translation.ja: 以後３年間の出場資格も失う

translation.en: what kind of miracle should we be expecting to at least represent us in an average way?
translation.ja: せめて互角に戦うにはどんな奇跡を待てばいい？

translation.en: Ekah is completely out of the question now.
translation.ja: 現時点でエカは無理です
昨日 結婚しました
そんな なぜ こうなるのか

translation.en: -That's so sad. -But we have two more options.
translation.ja: 残念だ まだ選択肢が２つあります

translation.en: The first will be a miracle.
We somehow convince Alhaji Sule to enrol Ekah.
translation.ja: 何とかスレを説得してエカを入学させる

translation.en: That will be definitely be an earth-shaking one.
translation.ja: 世界を揺るがす大事件だな
奇跡を願うか　それとも―

translation.en: -Fine. How are you guys? -We are very fine.
So, Sule. How did it go?
You gave me a sweet girl.
I can have her all day. No breaks.
translation.ja: 〈１日中 休まず抱いていられる〉

translation.en: She tasted like fresh cocoa yam mixed with palm oil.
translation.ja: 〈新鮮なタロイモとパーム油を混ぜた味がする〉

translation.en: -[both laugh] -Didn't I tell you? I told you.
I have not been out of this house in three days.
The wine is too sweet to go anywhere.
translation.ja: 〈うますぎるワインがあるからな〉

translation.en: -You have done me well. I will be back. -OK.
translation.ja: 〈待ってろ　すぐ戻る〉 〈分かった〉

translation.en: -I have a gift for you. -OK. Waiting.
translation.ja: 〈贈り物がある〉 〈待つよ〉 ルカス
すごいな　ありがとう

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You paid your debt very well.
[in English] Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you...
[in Kamtok] When you give me something nice, I have to return that favor.
translation.ja: 〈俺からもお返しをしなきゃな〉

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] You are a good brother. -Thanks and you, too.
translation.ja: 〈お前は兄弟同然だ〉 〈もう行っていいぞ〉 じゃあ

translation.en: He rapes me every-- every day.
[in Kamtok] Please forgive me for anything I have done wrong to you.
translation.ja: 〈悪い子だったことどうか許して〉

translation.en: Does your husband know you are here?
Your husband will not kill you. [in English] You hear me?
What is it again? What is it?
Solomon, do you think I am stupid?
I have told you people that I'm not a fool.
Nobody can play over my intelligence.
Why are talking you to me like a mad man?
Did you just call me a mad man?
Because I can show you real madness right now.
translation.ja: 〈本当の怒りをこれから見せてやる〉

translation.en: You always come here to look for your wife.
Your wife is under your care. Not mine.
translation.ja: 〈お前の妻だ　俺じゃない〉

translation.en: I am giving you two options.
you and your brother will bring my wife back.
translation.ja: 〈お前と弟で俺の妻を連れてくる〉

translation.en: Repay all the money you took from me.
translation.ja: 〈借金を返す〉 〈俺から奪い取った金を全部だ〉

translation.en: If you guys don't do any of these, heads will roll.
translation.ja: 〈どっちもしないなら首が飛ぶだろう〉
来てくれ こっちへ

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Didn't I tell you, in case of any issues, you should contact me first?
translation.ja: 〈何かあったら俺に言えと伝えたはずだろ〉

translation.en: -Why did you bring it to my brother? -No, no, no.

translation.ja: 〈帰れ　エカは連れていく〉
そんなの信じられるか

translation.en: I am not leaving without my wife.
Sule, what is going on here? I am lost.
translation.ja: 〈スレ どういうことだ〉 〈俺には さっぱりだ〉
何でもない 何だと？

translation.en: Then he borrowed more money from me.
Totaling 150,000 francs, so he gave me your daughter as payment.
translation.ja: 〈お前の娘を返済に充てたんだ〉

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't see my money or my beautiful wife,
translation.ja: 〈金か俺の妻をよこさなけば―〉

translation.en: You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
translation.ja: 〈借金の返済に利用したのか？〉

translation.en: You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
translation.ja: 〈俺の娘を返済に充てたのか？〉

translation.en: Bro, go home. I'll fix this.
Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
translation.ja: 〈エカがいた　パジューに〉

translation.en: -Andong. What is it? -Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
translation.ja: 〈どうしたの？〉 〈エカがパジューに〉
ねえ ソロモンおじさん
ソロモンおじさん 〈アンドン どうした？〉
〈アンドン どうした？〉 エカが…

translation.en: [woman, in English] What number must be multiplied by four
translation.ja: 次の数字を答えなさい ４を掛けると44になるのは？
正解 ダイアナさんフレッドは腹筋を１月に２回

translation.en: Fred does two sit-ups in January,
translation.ja: ダイアナさんフレッドは腹筋を１月に２回

translation.en: eight in March, sixteen in April.

translation.ja: このように続けた場合

translation.en: how many sit-ups will Fred do in May and June combined?
translation.ja: ５月と６月の腹筋回数は合計いくつ？

translation.en: Derick. How many days and hours are equal to 200 hours?
translation.ja: デリック 200時間は何日と何時間？
正解　よくできました

translation.en: Now, we will give room for each candidate to pose a question
translation.ja: ここからは― お互いに問題を出し合ってもらいます
お互いに問題を出し合ってもらいます

translation.en: If a candidate answers their opponent's question,
translation.ja: 相手の問題に正解して

translation.en: and this opponent fails to answer the other candidate's question,
translation.ja: 相手が自分の問題で不正解なら

translation.en: that candidate will be crowned winner.
translation.ja: その人が… 優勝です

translation.en: Now, Mr. Derick, your last question to Ms. Ekah.
translation.ja: デリックから最後の問題を

translation.en: True or false. The name "Teddy bear" is used to describe a soft toy bear.
translation.ja: “テディベア”についてウソか本当か答えなさい

translation.en: The name comes from President Theodore "Teddy" Roosevelt,
translation.ja: 名前の由来はセオドア･ルーズベルトが クマを逃がしてやったこと

translation.en: who once set a bear cub free.
translation.ja: クマを逃がしてやったこと

translation.en: [Ekah] The youngest woman who win the...

translation.ja: 平和の賞…　平和賞を…

translation.en: The youngest woman to win the Nobel Peace Prize, is who?
translation.ja: 最年少でノーベル平和賞を受賞した女性は誰ですか？

translation.en: She was born in Pakistan. And said that...
translation.ja: パキスタン出身でこう言いました
“女の子も教育を受けるべきです”

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She was shot by the Taliban in 2012.
[in English] But she did not die.

translation.ja: 正解です　エカさん

translation.en: [in Kamtok] My girl, Annabel must go to school.
[mouthing, in English] My name is Diana Ekah.

translation.ja: 結婚しています なぜなら…

translation.en: because... because I wanted to go school.
translation.ja: なぜなら学校に通うことを望んだから

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I know my father loves me.
Where I come from, the fish people don't believe in educating girls...
translation.ja: 〈でも漁民だから女子教育を信用してない〉

translation.en: I can't even believe I'm standing here today as the best.
translation.ja: 〈優勝なんて私も信じられません〉

translation.en: Best all-round student in a school such as this?
translation.ja: このような学校の首席？

translation.en: Thank you, Bodian Tech. It is such an honor.
translation.ja: ありがとう　大変光栄です

translation.en: And thank you, Nnlom Nnam Hand For Children,
translation.ja: 支援団体にも感謝します
〝ボディアン工科大〞 信じてくれた

translation.en: Most of you know my story.
Making it from the far-flung beach of Menchum right up to this podium,
translation.ja: 私は漁村からこの演壇にたどり着いた
願望や想像よりも勝ると
夢は燃え 輝く石炭のよう
そして全身の神経に浸透し

translation.en: in our body towards that passionate relentlessness,
translation.ja: そして全身の神経に浸透し 激しく燃え続ける
そして神は畏敬の念を抱かせ
いつでも１人 送り込む

translation.en: who is ready to burn with you towards the actualization of your dream.
translation.ja: あなたの夢を実現すべく共に燃える覚悟がある者を

translation.en: For being my light in a place of no lights.
translation.ja: 暗闇の中で私の光になってくれた

translation.en: I dedicate this today to you,
translation.ja: これはあなたに捧げます

translation.en: and may your soul rest in peace.
translation.ja: 安らかにお眠りください

translation.en: "There are two powers in this world."
"There is a third power, stronger than both."
translation.ja: “でも それより強いのは３つ目の力”

translation.en: Congratulations, Bodian Tech, and happy graduation to all of you.
translation.ja: ボディアン工科大の卒業生の皆さん おめでとう
みんな ありがとう

translation.en: And see you on the other side.
